summary: WHILE IDLING OR ENGAGED, CAR FREQUENTLY/PERIODICALLY SHUDDERS AS IF THE ENGINE WOULD DIE, LOSS OF POWER DURING ACCELERATION FOLLOWED BY GRADUAL SURGE, ENGINE LIGHT WOULD FLASH. TOOK VEHICLE TO DEALER 3 TIMES WITH COMPLAINT OVER 8-9 MOS, SYMPTOMS COULD NOT BE DUPLICATED, CODES NOT RECORDED, COULD NOT FIND ISSUE ON COMPUTER DIAGNOSTIC.  3-17 CAR STALLED REPEATEDLY, ENGINE LIGHT ON (CONSTANT).  CODES RECORDED, DIAGNOSED - CYLINDER HEAD NEEDS TO BE REPLACED.  WHEN ASKED WHAT WOULD CAUSE FAILURE, TECH STATED CARBON BUILD-UP. *JB
